amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for a one percent across-the- board cut excepting funding for Capitol Police, Architect of the Capitol, and the Sergeant at Arms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 114-120 to provide for a one percent across the board cut. Exempts Capitol Police, Architect of the Capitol, and the Sergeant at Arms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 250 (Roll no. 246).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 250 (Roll no. 246).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
